radiographic_examinations.findings: Infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm with extensive soft tissue surrounding the aorta and inflammation extending into the peri-aortic fat.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Marked decrease in the retroperitoneal inflammation noted in a follow-up CT scan performed about 2 months after the initiation of prednisone.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Fusiform dilatation of the infrarenal abdominal aorta measuring up to 3.1 cm and thickening of the anterior wall of the aorta up to 8 mm.
